name: nextra
description: Next.js and MDX based site generator.

scripts.build: microbundle src/index.js src/ssg.js src/loader.js src/react17-loader.js -o dist --no-sourcemap --target=node
scripts.dev: microbundle watch src/index.js src/ssg.js src/loader.js src/react17-loader.js -o dist --no-sourcemap --target=node
